name: TheAtlantic
text: The luxury fashion industry is built on the hierarchies of classism and racism. @amandamull explores what it would take for fashion to survive without them. https://t.co/u27gr9uY0P

name: TheAtlantic
text: Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman is retiring from the military due to the president's alleged “bullying." In February, @benjaminwittes wrote that he had been punished for “the crime of doing the right thing”: https://t.co/KCl2P21UaT
